# x5c

**Type**

The JSON Web Signature (JWS) header parameter that contains the certificate chain that corresponds to the key used to digitally sign the JWS.

## Declaration

```swift
[string] x5c
```

## Discussion

For more information, or to download Apple’s root and intermediate certificates, see [https://www.apple.com/certificateauthority/].

## Data types

- **alg**: An algorithm used to sign a JSON Web Signature.

items.description: An algorithm used to sign a JSON Web Signature.
items.name: alg
